game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a powerful artifact hidden within the long-abandoned temple. Your quest is to explore the ruins, overcome any obstacles, and retrieve the relic.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to elemental attacks

task.objective: Explore the temple's entrance hall and find a way past the rubble blocking the main hallway
task.description: The entrance hall is filled with debris. Search for any clues or objects that could aid in clearing the path.
task.location: Main Hall, Lost Temple of Eldarath

task.objective: Find and activate the ancient pressure plates to open the sealed door leading deeper into the temple
task.description: The plates are hidden within murals depicting scenes of nature. Look for any patterns that might indicate their locations.
task.location: West Wing, Lost Temple of Eldarath

task.objective: Retrive the artifact from the heart of the temple, avoiding or defeating the guardians along the way
task.description: The inner sanctum is heavily guarded by magical constructs. Use your wits and skills to overcome them.
task.location: Inner Sanctum, Lost Temple of Eldarath
